summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1639, for the improvement of the alley in block 12, D. S. Maynard's Plat of the Town (now City) of Seattle, being the alley from King Street to Jackson Street, between 2nd Avenue North to Occidental Avenue, by paving the same with vitrified brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation, under Ordinance No. 17431 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
